title: Turning an old AIO into an Extra Monitor
description: Not enough monitors? Have an old all-in-one machine lying around? Why waste it? Read along to find out how I turned potential e-waste into a 'free' extra monitor.

title: How To (Not) Optimize A Website
description: It's okay if it looks funky, but if it doesn't load in time, your website WILL lose visitors. In this post, I'll show you how I was able to boost my website's Lighthouse performance score to 100%.

title: How To (Not) Build A Website
description: In this post, I tell the tale of how this website came to be.

title: The Rubber Duck Just Got Smarter
description: The rubber duck is an invaluable debugging tool, essential to many programmers. In this post, join me as I humbly attempt to make a rubber ducky that can talk and respond (spoiler alert: it's still dumb).

title: Everything You Need To Know About Vibe Coding
Making an Astrophotography Camera For $150
description: Astrophotography is as expensive as it is addictive. Many people are working to fix the 'expensive' bit, and I'd like to be one of them. That's why I decided to make my own astrophotography camera using a Raspberry Pi and the official HQ Camera.
